content.p: Mexican government scholarships for science and technology Consejo Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnologia (CONACYT) is Mexico's national organisation for science and technology. CONACYT offers national and international scholarships for high-achieving Mexican students to study postgraduate masters and PhD degree programmes. The University of Nottingham is proud to be one of CONACYT's partner universities in the UK. See the CONACYT website for full guidance on funding and eligibility criteria. See our Mexico webpage for guidance on Nottingham's entry requirements for students from Mexico. See the CONACYT website for full details of the scholarship application process and deadlines.
